author: tlampen
body:
#### PR description:

As a continuation to PRs #36520 and #36927, this PR corrects the text printed in case a record exists in target but not in reference. 

#### PR validation:

The correct behaviour is illustrated at the end of the attached plot, a comparison of first and last payloads of DropBoxMetadata_v5.1_express.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
![DropBoxMetadata_Compare](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51359/154969689-55fa9189-671c-4014-a575-a7064625ba32.png)

attn: @mmusich
title: Fix printed text in Payload Inspector plots for DropBoxMetaData
